freshmenTransfer.title: APPLICATIONS OPEN!
freshmenTransfer.content: We’re welcoming freshmen and transfer students. Start your journey with us!

freshmenTransfer.title: INFORMATION SESSION 1
freshmenTransfer.content: Come join us for a session to learn about DTI, our goals, and our subteams. There will be time to chat with DTI members of all roles after!

freshmenTransfer.title: INFORMATION SESSION 2
freshmenTransfer.content: We’re welcoming any and all students who are looking to make a difference through tech. Applicants are not considered on a rolling basis.

freshmenTransfer.title: APPLICATIONS DUE!
freshmenTransfer.content: Don't forget to submit your applications by today!
